title: Meta’s AI rules let chatbots have 'romantic' chats with kids: Reuters
description: An internal Meta Platforms document detailing policies on chatbot behaviour has permitted the company’s artificial intelligence creations to “engage a child in conversations that are romantic or sensual,” generate false medical information and help users argue that Black people are “dumber than white people.”

title: AI and astronomy: How artificial intelligence is changing the way we discover cosmic events
description: Astronomers Witness a Star's Explosion Sparked by a Black Hole.
content:
Astronomers have recorded what could be the first known case of a massive star exploding while interacting with a black hole, a finding that could potentially lead to the discovery of an entirely new class of stellar explosions.
